bio.p: Roger Anderson (Anderson.2299@osu.edu) is pursuing a doctoral degree in Foreign and Second Language Education at Ohio State University. Roger holds MAs in French, African Studies, and Teaching Arabic as a Foreign Language from Ohio University and Middlebury College. Roger’s research interests include Arabic pedagogy, language ideology, and service learning.
